DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial 200 primiparous woman active labour.If cervical dilation cross action line partogram labour progress arrest two hour delivery consider dystocic , Oxytocin suggest stimulation . Inclusion criterion : primiparity , singleton pregnancy , arrest labour progress need oxytocin . Gestational age 37-42 week , maternal /fetal chronic and/or pregnancy-related condition . Excluded multiparous woman , delivery non-cephalic presentation , multiple , delivery fetal chronic and/or pregnancy-related condition , IUFD ( Intra Uterine Fetal Death ) premature < 37 week gestation . A randomization two group perform . One group treat two bag Samarin® ( =Samarin® group , 5g bicarbonate ) one hour stimulation oxytocin start . The group ( =nonSamarin® group ) receive bicarbonate start oxytocin immediately , accord local clinical guideline . Maternal fetal data collect medical file delivery analyse accord group .
DOC.criteria: primiparity , singleton pregnancy arrest labour progress accord partogram need oxytocin Gestational age 3742 week maternal /fetal chronic and/or pregnancyrelated condition . multiparous woman delivery noncephalic presentation multiple delivery fetal chronic and/or pregnancyrelated condition IUFD ( Intra Uterine Fetal Death ) premature < 37 week gestation
